title: Ben Smith and Beth Fouhy: Trump kicks off 2020 and the Democratic debate stage is set
description: Buzzfeed Editor in Chief Ben Smith and NBC News Senior Politics Editor Beth Fouhy join Chuck to talk about the president's re-election campaign, Elizabeth Warren's rise in the polls and claims by big fundraising predictions by Pete Buttigieg.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
